MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the TD1 postcode area of Galashiels is still ongoing. This is due to difficult ground conditions on site and we now expect power to be back on by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.15pm on Wednesday 28th October 2020.
